parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The value must be a UNIX timestamp (in seconds). If left empty, the current time is used.

parameters.name: MetricType
parameters.description:
The metric type. Valid values:

*   0: the basic job data.
*   1: the job running data.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The unique identifier (UID) of the namespace.

parameters.name: NamespaceSource
parameters.description: The source of the namespace. This parameter is required only for a special third party.

parameters.name: Operate
parameters.description:
The query type. Valid values:

*   query: queries data in a time range.
*   query_range: queries time series data in a time range.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The value must be a UNIX timestamp (in seconds).
